name: Owl Song
description:
You play as Lotta Makela, a 47-year-old gas station owner in the outskirts of Finland.

 

You have chosen to escape the stress of your everyday life, you seemingly cannot fathom anymore- and find yourself on a trip into the wilderness.

Mundane tasks, such as gathering materials and building up your camp give you a sense of accomplishment and safety. However, you soon discover that not only wildlife is awaiting you in these woods, but also pieces of your mind that you avoided to confront until now.

 

As you stay and expand your camp, you delve deeper into different auditive memories.

The Game is fully subtitled.

Localisation to English, German and Spanish.

You have to press [K] to switch between languages.

Localisation into Greek is on its way.

Created as a semester project at the University of Applied Sciences, Darmstadt, Faculty of Media.

Background Image:

‘Crumpled paper - texture pack‘ by raduluchian https://www.deviantart.com/raduluchian/art/Crumpled-paper-texture-pack-202036402
